thumb.title: 甘美な Sweet 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を甘美な暗いファンタジーの世界へと誘う魅惑的なメロディーを展開します。心の奥にひそむ複雑な感情が浮かび上がり、聴く人を独特な旅へと導いていきます。微妙に響くダークな音色が織り成す音景の中で、聴く人は不気味さと甘美さの狭間を旅することができるでしょう。暗闇に潜む神秘的な雰囲気が全体を包み込み、聴く人の心に長く残る印象を与える音楽体験が待っています！This music unfolds a captivating melody that draws listeners into a sweet, dark fantasy world. Complex emotions hidden deep within the heart rise to the surface, guiding the listener on a unique journey. Within the soundscape woven from subtly resonating dark tones, the listener can traverse the narrow space between eeriness and sweetness. A mysterious atmosphere lurking in the darkness envelops the entire piece, offering a musical experience that leaves a lasting impression on the listener's heart!https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
